Questions
Hurry up! We ……………………….. for you.a.waitingb.are waitingc.wait
‘What are you ……………………….?' ‘I ………………………. letters.’a.doing, writingb.done, writingc.doing, write
He …………………………. in Italy at the moment.a.worksb.workinc.is working
She doesn’t like to be disturbed when she …………………………..a.worksb.workingc.is working
That child ……………………………… bigger everyday.a.getsb.gettingc.goted
Who is that girl …………………………….. on the table?a.standb.standing  c.is standing
I …………………………….. for the shops to open. a.waitb.am waitingc.waiting
I …………………………….. Jane tomorrow.a.seeb.am seeingc.seeing
The universe ………………………, and has been so since its beginning.a.expandsb.is expandingc.expanding
My sister ……………………. at home for the moment.a.livesb.livingc.is living
I have to change my shoes. These _ me. I'm sure I have a blister.a.are killingb.kill
I feel a bit lost. I've just finished a really good novel and now I _ anything.a.am not readingb.do not read
Coming to London for Christmas was a great I idea. I _ it here.a.loveb.am loving
The company _ its offices to a bigger building next month.a.movesb.is moving
John really knows his subject. He _ a lecture on social media at university every Wednesday. You should come.a.givesb.is giving
Sarah _ me when I speak. It's so irritating.a.is always interruptingb.always interrupts
Can you help me with these boxes or _ ?a.are you busyb.are you being busy
I _ people who never really listen to what you say.a.am hatingb.hateExercise1:https://www.grammarbank.com/present-continuous-tense-exercises.html
